front.title: CMVP approved sensitive security parameter generation and establishment methods :CMVP validation authority updates to ISOIEC 24759

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: The approved sensitive security parameter generation and establishment methods listed in this publication replace the ones listed in ISO/IEC 19790 Annex D and ISO/IEC 24759 paragraph 6.16, within the context of the Cryptographic Module Validation Program (CMVP). As a validation authority, the CMVP may supersede Annex D in its entirety.
